item.title: संस्कृतशाला-प्रस्तावः
item.description: Archived project! Not being pursued! Motivation We have all heard of (and some of us have visited) schools where: students are instructed in samskritam and hindu arts besides regular subjects like science, mathematics, english, history, social science etc.. Often, the medium of instruction is bilingual - Sanskrit for some topics (esp. humanities), English for others. Benefits of such schools are as follows: Kids growing up in an environment filled with Indian culture is desirable - not just for their development, but also for the revival of bhAratIya samskriti.
